trans-unit.source: Represents a mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 表示鼠标设备。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: For mouse related input, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class.
trans-unit.target: 对于与鼠标相关输入，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class represents the mouse to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>类表示鼠标到应用程序，并提供方法、 属性和事件，来反映鼠标的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 获取报告此设备的输入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The source of input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 此设备的输入源。

trans-unit.source: for getting the active source.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取活动的源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标输入捕获到指定元素。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.Element>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>未指定，默认值<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>是<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.Element>。

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: 如果捕获了鼠标时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>引发事件并输入不转到下鼠标，元素<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>首先引发。

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: 这可使捕获的元素有机会前释放捕获<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 要捕获鼠标的元素。

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse events to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标事件捕获到指定元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素能够捕获鼠标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether the cursor is within its borders
trans-unit.target: 当在元素捕获鼠标时，它可以接收鼠标输入，光标是否在其边框内

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is not specified, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> is <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.Element>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>未指定，默认值<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>是<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.Element>。

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: 如果捕获了鼠标时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>引发事件并输入不转到下鼠标，元素<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>首先引发。

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: 这可使捕获的元素有机会前释放捕获<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>路由事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the mouse..
trans-unit.target: 要捕获鼠标的元素。

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的捕获策略。

trans-unit.source: Captures mouse input to the specified element using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" /> 将鼠标输入捕获到指定元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element was able to capture the mouse; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素能够捕获鼠标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。

trans-unit.source: To release mouse capture, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A> passing `null` as the element to capture.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放鼠标捕获，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Capture%2A>传递`null`作为要捕获的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is captured when a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> event is raised and the input is not going to the element underneath the mouse, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement> are raised first.
trans-unit.target: 如果捕获了鼠标时<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>引发事件并输入不转到下鼠标，元素<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement>首先引发。

trans-unit.source: This enables the captured element a chance to release capture before the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp> events are routed.
trans-unit.target: 这可使捕获的元素有机会前释放捕获<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp>路由事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="captureMode" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="captureMode" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取由鼠标捕获的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The element which is captured by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标捕获的元素。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，指示光标在其边框内。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the mouse pointer is directly over.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标指针正好悬停的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element the mouse pointer is over.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针悬停的元素。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is considered directly over an element if the mouse has been captured to that element.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素已捕获了鼠标，直接通过元素被视为鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Controls can be composed of multiple elements.
trans-unit.target: 控件可由多个元素构成。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> reports the specific element in the composite control the mouse pointer is over and not the control itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> 报告中鼠标指针位于复合控件和控件本身的特定元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> the pointer is over, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.DirectlyOver%2A> property could report the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，具体取决于的哪个部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>鼠标指针位于<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.DirectlyOver%2A>属性可能会报告<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to determine whether the mouse is over an element, which includes its visual child elements or control compositing elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsMouseOver%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>确定鼠标是否位于元素，包括其可视子元素或控件复合元素。

trans-unit.source: The button which is being queried.
trans-unit.target: 被查询的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the specified mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定鼠标按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 计算鼠标指针的位置（采用客户端坐标）。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 计算鼠标指针的位置（采用客户端坐标）。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针的位置（采用客户端坐标）。

trans-unit.source: The source in which to obtain the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中获取鼠标位置的源。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算鼠标指针在指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> 中的位置（采用客户端坐标）。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer, in client coordinates, in the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针在指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> 中的位置（采用客户端坐标）。

trans-unit.source: The frame of reference in which to calculate the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中计算鼠标位置的参考框架。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse relative to a specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定元素相对的鼠标位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse relative to the parameter <paramref name="relativeTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 与参数 <paramref name="relativeTo" /> 相对的鼠标位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer is calculated relative to the specified <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> with the upper-left corner of element being the point of origin, 0,0.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针的位置计算相对于指定<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>具有正在原点，0，0 的元素的左上角。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> is <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，或不为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the screen position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 计算鼠标指针的屏幕位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标指针的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the left mouse button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 获取此鼠标设备鼠标左键的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the middle button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 获取此鼠标设备鼠标中键的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor for the entire application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置整个应用程序的光标。

trans-unit.source: The override cursor or <see langword="null" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor" /> is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor" />，则为重写光标或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> that <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor%2A> is set to will be applied to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> ，<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor%2A>是设置为将应用于整个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: To clear the override <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>, set <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor%2A> to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除重写<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor%2A>到`null`。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A> will force the mouse cursor not to be displayed, but mouse events are still processed.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.OverrideCursor%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors.None%2A>将强制的鼠标光标不显示，但仍然处理鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the right button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 获取此鼠标设备鼠标右键的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The cursor to set the mouse pointer to.
trans-unit.target: 要将鼠标指针设置为的光标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the mouse pointer to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Cursor" />
trans-unit.target: 将鼠标指针设置为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Cursor" />

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse cursor is set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置鼠标光标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that this cursor does not apply any particular <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, but rather it applies to the whole application.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此光标不适用于任何特定<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，但它而是适用于整个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse to resynchronize.
trans-unit.target: 强制同步鼠标重新。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> monitors layout changes and calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Synchronize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>监视布局更改和调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice.Synchronize%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There are cases in which the mouse input system must be forced to update for it to respond to changes.
trans-unit.target: 在情况下在其中必须强制鼠标输入的系统更新才能对更改做出响应。

trans-unit.source: For example, you must resynchronize the mouse on a timer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你必须重新同步在计时器上的鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that the input from this mouse device is sent to.
trans-unit.target: 获取要将此鼠标设备的输入发送到的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The element that receives the input.
trans-unit.target: 接收输入的元素。

trans-unit.source: The target for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice> is the object the mouse is over or the object with mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 针对<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseDevice>是鼠标位于对象或具有鼠标捕获的对象。

trans-unit.source: Forces the mouse cursor to update.
trans-unit.target: 强制更新鼠标光标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the first extended button on this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 获取此鼠标设备第一个扩展按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the second extended button of this mouse device.
trans-unit.target: 获取此鼠标设备第二个扩展按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the button.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的状态。
